name: Kloud Mobile
overview:
Kloud Mobile helps brands and key verticals reach and monitise the mobile channel, through mobile applications, mobile Internet sites, SMS campaigns and Bluetooth proximity solutions.

The Kloud platform delivers connectivity, intelligence, reliability and scalability through the Internet utilising a network of servers and virtualisation technologies, with a single point of access from your own applications and software using our Open Mobile Application Framework (OMAppâ„¢).

Two-way interactive SMS and MMS messaging is available with the ability to deliver to more than 700 networks in more than 150 countries using high-grade routes. Inbound SMS and MMS messaging is available on shared or dedicated short codes and long numbers, and available in the UK, US, Canada and Germany as standard.
